poster: Î¡ E S T E K
title: Can't log in after region change from EUNE to NA
body:
Hi Guys

I've got a problem I cant log in to the game after i moved to US. I was in EUNE server, now, whenever i try to log in, it says that i've got wrong user name or password.

Everything is fine when i log in to EUNE like always. 

Please, help me.

replies.body: This happened to me as well, I changed my region from EU west to North America and my password won't work
I have a similar issue. I just clicked another region and language on my log in and now I'm stuck and I can't get it back to English and I can't log in to my account on the internet. HELP!?

Assuming this is the account you are posting from, you would need to perform an account transfer to access the NA region.  Make sure you're not in any ranked teams, and review the [Transfer FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ) to confirm what will or will not be transferred along with you.  If this is in reference to another account, try using a previous username you've had if you've been on NA with that account in the past.  Hope that helps!
